articles.description: Follow build-up to five Premier league matches including Brighton v Everton, Leeds United v Arsenal, Wolves v Bournemouth, Chelsea v West Ham and Liverpool v Newcastle United.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Brighton v Everton, Leeds United v Arsenal, Wolves v Bournemouth, Chelsea v West Ham and Liverpool v Newcastle United

articles.description: Noni Madueke stars as Arsenal extend their lead at the top of the Premier League to seven points with a comfortable win at Leeds United.
articles.title: Leeds United 0-4 Arsenal: Noni Madueke stars in comfortable win

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound and follow live text coverage of Saturday's Scottish football, including four matches in the Premiership.
articles.title: Saturday's Scottish football - radio commentary & live text

articles.description: Why 'unstoppable' Elena Rybakina will believe her Australian Open triumph can begin a period of sustained success after ending a four-year wait for her second major title.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Elena Rybakina returns to the top after four-year wait for second major title

articles.description: Live text commentary, score updates and team news from eight Championship matches including Middlesbrough v Norwich City, QPR v Coventry City and Portsmouth v West Brom.
articles.title: Championship LIVE: Text commentary, score updates and team news from 11 matches

articles.description: After losing another Grand Slam final - this time to Elena Rybakina at the Australian Open - BBC Sport asks if Aryna Sabalenka is underachieving at the majors.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Aryna Sabalenka contemplates another major final loss as Elena Rybakina triumphs in Melbourne

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Wolverhampton Wanderers vs AFC Bournemouth in the Premier League
articles.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs AFC Bournemouth: Premier League preview, team news, stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Nottingham Forest agree a deal for Manchester City goalkeeper Stefan Ortega worth up to £500,000.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest agree deal for Stefan Ortega and target Davide Frattesi

articles.description: Whoever wins the Australian Open men's singles final will create history - but it feels like Novak Djokovic needs victory more than Carlos Alcaraz.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026 men's final: Why Novak Djokovic needs Melbourne victory more than Carlos Alcaraz

articles.description: Florian Wirtz sits down with Kelly Somers to talk about his slow start at Anfield, playing padel and making Bundesliga history.
articles.title: Florian Wirtz: Liverpool attacking midfielder in his own words
